name: edd_license
title: EDD License
description: Loop through licenses of Easy Digital Downloads

creation_date.description: Creation exact date. Will ignore creation_start and creation_end if specified

expiration_date.description: Creation start date or 'any' for any non-lifetime expiration. Will ignore expiration_start and expiration_end if specified

user.description: User ID, name, or "current". Ignores all other arguments if specified.

payment_id.description: Get licenses for specific payment. Ignores all other arguments if specified.

child_licenses.description: List of EDD_SL_License objects for the child licenses. Returns a loop.

download.description: Gets associated download. Returns a loop.

activations.description: Gets license activations. Returns a loop.

logs.description: Gets license logs. Returns a loop.

is_at_limit.description: Returns if the license is at its activation limit

license_length.description: Get the string equivalent of the length of the license. For example: +1years

license_term.description: Used to display the term for a given license to the user
